title: When to say Takbeer Allahu Akbar if one sits for Jilsatul Istiraahah
transcript:
[Questioner] from Pakistan my question 
is about jalsatul istiraaha about what   when we get up from rukoo' okay yes and my 
question is then when should we say Allah Akbar   when we are getting up from the sujood or when we 
are getting up from jalsatul istiraaha position   I have my own opinion in this regards 
and this is my own opinion and that is the short pause where you sit when you rise from 
the second sujood of your first raka to the second   raka or from your third raka to your fourth raka 
so when I Rise Up from sujud I pause by sitting   down and then I stand up again and this is back 
by the Hadith of Malik may Allah be pleased with   him when he prayed in front of his companions 
to teach them how the prophet Allah used to pray   and none of the companions or his friends or 
uh the contemporaries of the Prophet (Peace and   Blessings Upon him) commended by saying No this 
is wrong and the Hadith is in al-bukhari so it's   the highest grade of uh authentic Hadith and this 
is in the Shaafi'i part of the recommended Sunnah   and uh Sheikh Al-Albani also recommends it and 
Sheikh Ibn Baz says that if you do it it's good   if you don't do it it's okay as well so when 
does a person offer takabir if you're alone   or you are praying behind an Imam once you rise 
from the second sujood you say Allahu Akbar you   pause a little bit and you stand up there's 
no problem in that because nobody's following   you if you are the Imam this becomes problematic 
because a lot of the Muslims don't know the Sunnah   so if you say well sujud and you rise and say 
Allahu Akbar and you sit everybody behind you   would say subhanallah subhanallah thinking 
that yours you're mistaken and you're sitting   for the tashaud not knowing that you're 
a couple of seconds You're Gonna Stand Up   to avoid confusion it's best that you rise 
up sit and while you're standing from this   sitting position you say Allahu Akbar 
and everything goes normally inshallah and have you ever taken a counseling session with 
me go to my website and you will find counseling   sessions and apply for one if you can afford it 
that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled   for one free session and this is for everybody 
if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot   afford it because they're poor I'll give them 
one free session without a problem a full half   an hour so come to me and let's speak about 
it inshallah within the following two days   or three days I will uh try and seek Allah's 
guidance to solve the problem once and for All
